entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:43 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.2°C
entry.summary:

Dewpoint: -22.8°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries south of Plum Point. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24 except minus 28 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries south of Plum Point. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24 except minus 28 inland. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
